mapper.update:
update dy_sy_video
video_img = #{videoImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_duration = #{videoDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_xiaoimg = #{videoXiaoimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_typeid = #{videoTypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_heat = #{videoHeat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_status = #{videoStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
small_picture = #{smallPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_info = #{videoInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dy_sy_video set video_img = #{videoImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_duration = #{videoDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_xiaoimg = #{videoXiaoimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_name = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_typeid = #{videoTypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_heat = #{videoHeat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_status = #{videoStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, small_picture = #{smallPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_info = #{videoInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from dy_sy_video where video_id in (${id})
